channel.title: Library on Guowei Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Library on Guowei Lv

item.title: An Android version of the iMessage voice note recorder
item.description: I created a copy of the voice recorder in the iMessage app for android and made a library out of it. Check it out here!

item.title: My Second Android Library
item.description: I published my second android library project, a date and time picker dialog that mimic the one in Google Map app. Go check it out here!

item.title: My first Android library!
item.description: I published my first android library for creating customized progressbar. Go check here!
